Comment: Earlier this year, Trump taking power enabled a rally of the far-right in Europe, Madrid specifically, by the so-called "Patriots for Europe". They explicitly chose the right time and the exact reason: "Trump's admission into presidency is a wake-up call for the true European patriots to take back their countries from Brussels".  They don't have words for the US' funeral. They want to follow the same footsteps, right towards their own funeral.
